backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types for theme preferences, hero section themes with particle/motion/vector effects, social media links, clinics, services, and reviews. Includes authorization and blob storage mixins for access control and file management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: diagnosing page load failures and updating Footer component background animation to match hero section effects.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App, hooks, Header, Footer, Hero, Overview, About, Services, Clinics, SocialMedia, EditableContent, ProfileSetupModal, AdminPanel, and various admin manager components with their key functionality and error handling approaches.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and title "Dr. Malay Akechan - General Physician".
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Internet Computer domain configuration file specifying the custom domain "drmalay.in".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with ErrorBoundary, theme provider, authentication state management, hash-based routing between home and blogs views, admin panel toggle, and ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component displaying doctor profile with editable content/image, loading skeletons, error handling with Alert components, and DoctorCredentialsCard integration with Material Design styling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClinicsMan: Admin interface for managing clinic entries with CRUD operations, image upload with progress tracking, and form fields for name, address, contact details, hours, map link, and booking URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentMan: Admin panel for managing website images (hero background, doctor photos, clinic images) and hero section content with support for light/dark mode images, upload progress, and predefined image categories.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroThemeM: Admin component for managing hero section theme settings including particle effects, motion effects, vector effects, and spacing configurations with real-time preview and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReviewsMan: Admin component for managing patient reviews with CRUD operations, image upload support, and review panel settings configuration including visibility toggles and submission guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServicesMa: Admin component for managing medical services with add, edit, and delete operations using dialog forms for service name and description.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialMedi: Admin component for managing social media links with CRUD operations, supporting platform, display name, URL, icon size, order, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel container with six-tab interface for managing Content & Images, Hero Theme, Clinics, Services, Reviews, and Social Media with close button functionality.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogDetail: Component for displaying a single blog post with formatted date, author info, rich content rendering, and conditional edit button for admin users.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogList.t: Component for displaying a list of blog posts with preview text, sorted by creation date, including admin controls for editing and deleting posts with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogPostEd: Dialog component for creating and editing blog posts with rich content blocks (text and images), including image upload with progress tracking and integration with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichConten: Renders blog post content elements (text, images, videos) with support for both formatted HTML and plain text, applying appropriate styling and layout.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichTextEd: WYSIWYG rich text editor with toolbar for formatting (headings, bold, italic, lists, links, quotes) using contentEditable and document.execCommand.
frontend/src/components/BlogsPage.tsx: Main blog page component that displays a list of blog posts or a single post detail view, with admin controls for creating and editing posts. Includes loading states, empty states, and a dialog for post editing.
frontend/src/components/Clinics.tsx: Displays a grid of clinic location cards with contact information, hours, and map links. Shows loading skeletons, handles errors, and hides section when no clinics exist for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/DoctorCredential: Card component displaying doctor's professional credentials including name, qualifications, specializations, experience, and achievements. Provides admin edit dialog and editable profile image functionality.
Reusable component for inline editing of website content fields (overview and about sections). Shows edit/save/cancel controls for admins and plain text for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/EditableFooterCo: Inline editable component for footer fields (address, phone, email, copyright). Provides edit mode with input field and save/cancel buttons for admin users.
frontend/src/components/EditableHeroCont: Manages inline editing of hero section content including headline, subtext, and button text/links. Opens a dialog for admin editing with separate handling for text and button elements.
frontend/src/components/EditableImage.ts: A component that displays images with admin editing capabilities, supporting light/dark mode variants, file uploads with progress tracking, and fallback placeholders when no image is present.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the website footer with contact information, quick navigation links, social media icons, and animated background effects matching the hero section theme; includes admin editing capabilities and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A sticky header component with navigation menu, authentication controls (Internet Identity login/logout), theme toggle, and admin panel access; includes responsive mobile menu and smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with customizable background images, animated effects, glassmorphism styling, and editable content (headline, subtext, CTA buttons); supports extensive layout configuration including positioning, sizing, and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Mot: Canvas-based animation layer rendering wave or floating motion effects with Material Design elevation, shadows, and configurable speed/amplitude.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Par: Canvas-based particle system rendering bubbles, sparkles, or confetti with Material Design styling, configurable intensity/speed, and smooth animations.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Vec: SVG-based effect layer rendering animated geometric patterns or paths with glow filters, configurable complexity, and color schemes.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroMultiEf: Composite component that conditionally renders particle, motion, and vector effect layers based on configuration and enabled state.
frontend/src/components/Overview.tsx: Renders an overview section with four highlight cards (Expert Care, Patient-Centered, Experienced, Trusted) and editable content; includes loading skeletons, error handling, and animated background accents.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed and showing loading states during submission.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Displays a carousel of customer reviews with auto-scroll functionality, manual navigation buttons, and configurable settings (max reviews, scroll speed). Handles deduplication, loading states, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a grid of medical services with gradient accents and hover effects. Shows loading skeletons, handles errors, and hides the section when no services exist and user is not admin.
frontend/src/components/SocialMedia.tsx: Displays social media links as icon buttons with platform-specific icons (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.). Filters visible links and hides section when empty for non-admin users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating an anonymous or authenticated actor based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroLayoutPreset.t: React hook that analyzes hero images to determine optimal layout presets (left/right/centered/bottom-overlay) based on brightness, contrast, visual weight distribution, and busyness, returning configuration for overlay strength, container width, and text size.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, website content, footer content, doctor credentials, authorization checks, and configuration, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/ic-assets.json: IC asset configuration that ensures the .well-known directory is not ignored during asset upload.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a high-tech multicolor design system for both light and dark modes, including primary (electric blue), secondary (purple), accent (cyan), and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/utils/heroImageAnalysis.ts: Client-side image analysis utility that uses canvas to calculate brightness, contrast, left/right visual weight, and edge density (busyness) from hero images to inform layout decisions.
frontend/src/utils/heroThemeDefaults.ts: Provides utility functions for safely handling HeroSectionTheme data, including bigint conversions, clamping, position/dimension calculations, and theme normalization with defaults for glassmorphism and gradient effects.
frontend/src/utils/particleEffectTypes.t: Defines metadata for particle effect types (bubbles, confetti, sparkles, dots, rings, swirls, lines, medical symbols) with labels and descriptions, plus helper functions to retrieve human-readable names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing sensitive parameters from the URL without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (HSL-based design tokens), container settings, border radius variables, and custom box shadows including elevation and glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking two fix requests: diagnosing page content loading failure and updating footer background animation to match hero section's particle/motion/vector effects system.
